name: Import Google Sheets data into Invoice Ninja
description: This template helps you import a list of customers automatically from Google Sheets to Invoice Ninja. The scenario can be scheduled to run at regular intervals: every minute, hour, day or at the specified date. The template uses [this example from Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17AutCAMLzuIPogSMdKRy2ClAZqABKwjhzFqCXbxuZVQ/edit?usp=sharing).
